lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors really mess with me right before we go live--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a generic D&D Beyond spot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You guys weren't supposed to see that piece until after I died, so I apologize if you guys didn't get what you wanted in my will.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can arrange it. Don't worry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's now fully customizable on a much easier and accessible level, which is now causing my wife to have a small aneurysm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are tons of rewards and stretch goals available as part of the Kickstarter campaign, including unlocking an exclusive cover design, a new book, a series of new book sizes the ability to fully customize your page layouts and even braille, which is fantastic, so go support the campaign.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is an irrelevant one to show off at this point because it's-- but the great-- that's yours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're happy to share with you guys tonight, we have a new addition to Critical Role, live closed captions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're currently watching and doing this, I'm so sorry, and we love you, and thank you and welcome aboard.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you guys are doing this, is there anything else you're doing or are you moving forward, and if you are, what's the marching order?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think you may have dropped it, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Invisibility? I don't think you dropped it.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'll put the thing in the bag and then we'll just go, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I wasn't crazy. I wasn't crazy.

lines.text: There's enough space for a number of you to fit underneath at once. It's a wide door, so you could all scoot in at the same time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of you get lower and it's very much like having to pull yourself down and the door you expected to be a thin doorway. It's pretty far in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whatever the case may be, there's a period of time where your mind can't help but consider the terrible strength of this if it were to come down and smash you.

lines.text: Make a perception check for me.

lines.text: You look up and get a bit of a better view of that area and it looks like a bunch of-- they were sacks at a distance, at the edge of your periphery. Getting close, you can see they're bunches of textured, looks like rope or threads, thick threads that are all jammed together.

lines.text: Going to go ahead and attempt to strike you twice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where you are right now, you cannot see it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Made a big point about putting me ten feet in front of Caduceus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, but he's about 20 feet above that area.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say, I'll say, roll a perception check for me, with disadvantage. I'm allowing you free, because you'd be focusing on Caleb, storyline-wise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine, you do not see it, unfortunately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 14 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and the second one is a 21 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (booming) It's going to go ahead and back away into the mist. It's going to vanish downward.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't suppose it gets near enough for me to have a reaction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have War Caster as a feat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can reaction spell cast against it if you want to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will throw a Fire Bolt at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With disadvantage because it is invisible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that finishes its go. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not moving fast enough and I have no idea what happened down below, so I pull out a cocoon and do what I wanted to do the last time and didn't and mimic Jester and there is a second giant eagle in the chamber.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and you just go ahead and leap down?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I get-- okay, never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get to this space here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as this giant eagle, this shape, of where Caleb was looking, you see just and dive down into the mist--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will-- I will dash. I will move and dash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That gets you there with a movement and dash.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far back is Caduceus from me? Like 70 feet back?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can only move 60 a turn, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll stay put and hold my action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You fall towards the spire crystal (whooshes) and you see the point of it rocketing towards your torso.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I use my Misty Step bonus action to go out towards the wall to stop my momentum out towards wherever the stairs might be on the right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an acrobatics check for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You slip a little bit and stumble down two of them, but get yourself back to your feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On my ass. You didn't see that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll get up and use the rest of my movement to walk down to where Beau is if I can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are also in the dark again, by the way, because the Driftglobe has been absorbed into my eagle form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or one eagle ran by. Another shadow went by right as the light--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know if I would have taken my full 60 if I would have been in darkness, I will say.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you want, you can move me 30 back and I have a light source now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now that I'm down there, can I see the door behind Beau?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll just send two Eldritch Blasts at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and roll attack for each.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, I'll say disadvantage, but we'll see how well you do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25, okay, both hit. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 13 points force damage for the first one and seven for the second, so 20 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to take a lot of Eldritch Blasts to try and blast through that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, ending Fjord's turn, Jester, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, but I do, and I'm--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott first and then Caduceus up the spiral.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know it's her. I'll let her grab me, I guess.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know who this is, but I'm going to let it happen. It's cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both Nott and Caduceus are currently--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know what this is, but I'm going to let it happen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I'm going to use the rest of my movement to fly down with them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I cough up a little blood (coughs).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Before it falls away like an onion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How do I-- so there's no handle, there's no--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see a handle anywhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do an investigation check to see if there's any slots, any--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a part where it loops into an oval and you look and you see there's a spot, like a little dark circle there, with a little empty slot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I put it to good use.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say that's your bonus and action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we want to take a second and heal again? That was a lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a monster in here with us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think there is a monster anymore.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I don't have anything else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The stonework here is like a dark, dark brown and red, like the color shift is notable.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's all the description you give?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You move from the hallway into the next room?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to wait for people to gather.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. All right, Yasha?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to make my way down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just a giant eagle in the middle of a--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you want to go down?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm just going to keep walking down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In my eagle form, I laugh. Ha ha ha.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, was I on the top of that? Oh, because we hadn't gone--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be, ooh, 24 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Advantage, because you are a War Caster.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What was the damage on that again, please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 points of bludgeoning damage and another check with advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to then dissipate in the mist.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I get an attack of opportunity?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rake my talons across it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so then, that was a 15 to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, 20. Sorry, I rolled a 15 and a ten, so it was a 20 or a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That finishes its go. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I was feeling saucy a moment ago, but not so much anymore, so I'm going to float and try to find open space down below to land.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does their big ass flapping accelerate the mist out of the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you rush past, it does get an attack of opportunity on you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 20 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 12 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so I revert into a human in midair, so you tell me what happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 11 points of bludgeoning damage, landing on the stairs on your back (crunches).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I still have an action? Because I didn't do anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you still have your action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will use, where's the door?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I will use my action for movement, so half of it's just to get to standing and then feel my way down through it, so I bump into-- Oh, hello, Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the open door and you can see the shape of Beauregard beyond it, about ten feet beyond the door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to head just inside the door and then hold my action to fire a bolt at that thing the second it shows up again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I get five feet into the chamber and just behind the door and look up or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You won't have much of a view except for what's just beyond the door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm pretty messed up. I'm just going to, I'm just going to be five feet in and hold an action in case I can see it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you turn back towards the door and just hold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, what are you doing? You're still being held by the talon of Jester, but she's landed and is releasing you, so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to make my way downtown into the next chamber.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you move past Beauregard or up against her?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just up to where she is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no light in there, but you have darkvision.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The light, by the way, which you cast, still diminished. It's like the radius of it and the strength of it is halved in wherever you are at the moment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it come back out if it was out when he--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Driftglobe is lighting the cave--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Driftglobe, its daylight still diminished by half.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems like all light sources are drastically reduced--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does that effect darkvisioned creatures as well? Like can we see half as far?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a general gathering of shadows in this space, unlike other places you've been.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no, I just never thought about it before today.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll spend my action to turn to Beau and say: Did you take my flask? (laughter) Do you have my flask?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did not, but why do you have your hands on your butt?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would tell you if I stole something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll move through the-- yep, through the doorway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 gets you right in front of Jester and Nott and you have a view of the chamber beyond.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With my half of my 60 darkvision, do I see anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then on each side of the room, you can see these two slopes that disappear out of view, like two sides of the room, there's pits that slope down and towards the walls.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll wait where I am and I'll turn around and I'll hold an Eldritch Blast like Caduceus is doing back towards the doorway in case the thing shows up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What all is in the room still with us? I mean, it's just Caleb in here with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's Caleb, and Yasha, you haven't seen come downstairs yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I see Yasha around anywhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Although you have perception, I think it's a giant eagle, advantage--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's just a single roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's no darkvision, but we've got light.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it, my wisdom modifier?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your wisdom modifier or any perception bonus--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. I already did that. It's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say you can look up and you can just barely see the outline of Yasha running down the stairs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (caws) I fly up and can I grab Yasha then?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I fly down and put her on the ground next to Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You set Yasha down. That's your action, most of your movement.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm assuming I can't get through the doorway as this giant--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That door is way too small for a giant eagle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try to block everybody from whatever that mist creature is.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did you say that there were markings on the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It matches the pillar that's in the center.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the crystal is a part of.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to make my way inside with everybody else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get right next to Caduceus on the inside or you can move past and join Fjord.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll move past and join Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see within the chamber exactly what it is that Fjord can see as he's looking behind the Eldritch Blast held there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You said bird bath? Describe it one more time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's the two sliding pits that descend into the floor and then just on the outside of your visual radius, within the chamber, you can see a little-- like a platform, like a birdbath type platform that's about two-and-a-half feet off the ground and has a top surface like a table it looks like--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A little dais or stone rise that this thing's on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like it's on the ground and then on each side of where it stands, it looks like part of the ground turns into a slope that goes beneath the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I stealthily start making my way into the chamber.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: ♪ Making my way into the chamber ♪

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can walk all the way up and look down if you want to try and inspect it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will do that now and does it look like there's blood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can just make out shapes with your darkvision, but make a perception check as you glance down at the areas left and right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Daylight would be reaching 30 feet if there's no--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hitting the hall, so there's a little bit of light coming through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see through the light that's coming through, dark streaks. It looks like some sort of substance that dried on a long time ago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your darkvision allows you to see bodies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This dark space continues below it so whatever this chamber is, whatever's holding these bodies seems to extend below and beyond the perimeter of the room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't want to say anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, not at this height, you cannot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I see Jester though, hold on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be a 20 to hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it hits me both times.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 points of bludgeoning damage on the critical.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then Jester takes an additional 11 points of bludgeoning damage from it after you revert back to your normal form.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, is that eight plus eight, 16.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it is, well, no, it's just a plus one handaxe. But--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I get poison damage in addition to it now, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The mist is going to have a tough time bleeding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it takes the damage (growls) and vanishes into the mist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Caleb's go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now it's Jester and I down here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to take a chance and bat guano and sulfur and I'm going to throw a Fireball up about 50 feet and set it off above us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) All right, so it's going to make a dexterity saving throw, that is going to be 12, nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This loosely humanoid, but extended, a ghostly whipping wind version of a humanoid shape and then, as the flames vanish, the mist slowly fills it back in and you have no idea where the creature went.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to then back just in the doorway, not even going that far, so that I could still pop one out if I needed to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, Caduceus, anything you want to do this turn? You're just waiting on Beau. You heading in with her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She went into the room, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm holding just to get people through.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm waiting for people to come through and holding the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're holding your action on the door, going to grab and try and close it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll look if there's a handy dandy, you know, foot pedal to close the door with or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a perception check or investigation check for you. Either/or for this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are elements of the door that could be pulled, maybe, but you don't see a pedal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is everybody out of the room already?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Leave me in here. It's no big deal, whatever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the plan, that's the plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You staying put or are you moving in with Beau?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll stay at the door and hold my action to fire if I see the mist thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You doing anything? (laughter) All right, Jester, what are you--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll move forward with Beau, up to Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You move in with Beau and you perceive the same space and scenery around you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess I will leave the room then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go ahead and enter the chamber.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ting, ting, ting, ting, ting on the opposite side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The key spit out a one-way trip.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can get out of there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll also say that we can, probably, worse case scenario, teleport through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll come back here shortly with--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we give a round of applause to the fucking map by Mr. Mercer? (applause)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (upbeat music) ♪ You've got the perfect warlock ♪ ♪ Her weapons and supplies ♪ ♪ But you need a place to track your stuff ♪ ♪ 'cause you're so disorganized. ♪ ♪ You click open the webpage ♪ ♪ You heard about on Critical Role ♪ ♪ And now you're ready to kick some butt ♪ ♪ In that mineshaft full of gnolls ♪ ♪ It's D&D! ♪ ♪ D&D ♪ ♪ D&D Beyond. Yeah, D&D! ♪ ♪ D&D Beyond ♪ ♪ You've got your stats, you've got your sword ♪ ♪ And you've got your invisible wand. ♪ ♪ It's D&D, D&D ♪ ♪ D&D ♪ ♪ D&D Beyond ♪ TRAVIS (VO): Last time on Yee-Haw Game Ranch.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: What? A dragon? Who are you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mortals have named me Drak'Ar Noir.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Wait, your name is Drak'Ar Noir? Like the cologne I wore in middle school?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On my travels, I've heard tales from many critters of a man they call the Chosen One.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Wait, but you haven't heard about me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, yeah, I've heard about you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They say a tether ball's pole's got more meat on it than you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That you're a malnourished, dried up volleyball-looking little fuck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am merely a messenger of the many bards across the lands.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Where are you from, anyway, Drak'Ar?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm so glad you asked! I come from one of the most prestigious game realms: Yee-Haw Fantasy Ranch.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: What can we do for you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I came to present a song, to sing for the Chosen One.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A sort of battle hymn, if you will.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (dramatic music) ♪ 'Twixt shattered realms, here comes an outlaw ♪ ♪ To heal and order the realms of Yee-Haw ♪ ♪ With his mighty joystick, he quests near and far ♪ ♪ The plaid-clad hero who slay Bast'Alar ♪ ♪ Hi-ho, realmwalker, now onward you roam ♪ ♪ The Fantasy Ranch shall be your new home ♪ ♪ No need to bring Brian, for he's really dumb ♪ ♪ Now sing our song, blessed Chosen One ♪ ♪ Bee bop a doo, bee bop a doo ♪ ♪ Die die diddle do ♪ ♪ Bee bop a do, bee bop a do ♪ ♪ Die die diddle dee ♪

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: What was the thing with the bombs on this one, dude?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When they land or what? Don't fucking when you see me (burps).

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Dude, we're on the internet right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, I got one of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I went and grabbed it and it--

lines.name: MAX
lines.text: That's not what the bomb arrows look like.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have yet to see a bomb arrow.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: We have yet to see your butthole.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is this gray thing going to hurt me, Max?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why am I on acid now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How'd that arrow make it through? Boom! (shouting)

lines.name: BRAIN
lines.text: No, take the ticket. Take it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (yelling) I don't want to be inebriated!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Come here with your pity shield.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: No, give me your pity shield.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Have you always wanted to be a voice actor? (suspenseful strings)

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Who's here? (high-pitched cut off scream) (speakeasy music) BRIAN (VO): Last time on Talks Machina.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you see the shit that an average Dungeons & Dragons character sees on a day-to-day basis--

lines.name: DANI
lines.text: A chair in the middle of a room.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: A rug that tries to suffocate you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, there is scary-ass shit in Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Steve Martin gunslinger shooting a 14-year-old through the hand. That's intense.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It could be something else, but for me, I rely on that a lot, all right? It's a crutch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're seeing people decapitated, melted in acid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why do people play this game? It's satanic.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Oh, maybe it all circles back around and maybe it really is.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Plus, with you sitting right next to her, when you're not looking at the Twitch chat to try and figure out what to do next or fishing for compliments, you can look at her journal, because it's pretty close to where you keep your iPad with it--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Small correction, I'm half on her journal and half on the Reddit thread.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're also on Zillow a lot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want to be on top of them.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Are you having foundation issues and you're thinking about--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't tell the buyer, but yes.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: We have no excuse. We have no, "Sorry, guys, "we're super loopy from Denver, we just had--" I don't know. Our winner-- can I get to the goddamn--

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Our winner for this week was sent in by Courtney Armstead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They do Vex and Vax. They do Jester and Caleb as goth twins.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Every week? What are you talking about?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They post-- I mean, I'm in the hashtag looking at art every week.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gimme this. These are what these are for, right?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Were you simulating-- you said bend over?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've never pummeled somebody with trophies before?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: But was that sort of like a heavy spanking or where you penetrating?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I meant for him to duck so I could fight monsters, Brian.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I've never heard Sam's butt cheeks referred to as monsters.

lines.name: BRIAN

lines.text: Did you burn through all your spells?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to keep an eye.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where the fuck did you put us? What is this place?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (yelling) What do you want from us?
